text:
Admetrics | Python Developer | Frankfurt, Germany | Full-time | ONSITE | VISA sponsorship | http://www.admetrics.io

At admetrics we build products which enable our clients to gain superior data-driven insights by providing better data through cutting-edge analytics technology. Our analytics platform and data is already being used by global leaders in online advertising. We're a small, specialized team working from Frankfurt/Germany and ZÃ¼rich/Switzerland and we plan to continue expanding organically. With over a decade of experience in web engineering we aren't exactly a startup - but still kind of operate that way. We like small and agile. We like hands on, dynamic and up, close and personal.
